options.content:
# Kyverno
A Kubernetes-native policy management engine

#### About this dashboard

This dashboard represents generic insights which can be extracted and made well use of from a cluster with Kyverno in action.

#### For more details around the metrics

Checkout the [official docs of Kyverno metrics](https://kyverno.io/docs/monitoring-kyverno-with-prometheus-metrics/)

panels.title: Active Policies running in background mode
